x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
n the organization, multiple teams continue to rely on legacy applications and tools to manage their day-to-day operations. These systems pose several challenges:
- High Dependency on Manual Processes: Legacy tools often lack modern automation capabilities, leading to inefficiencies and increased chances of human error. - Technology Maintenance Overhead: Maintaining outdated systems demands significant effort in terms of infrastructure, upgrades, and support, diverting resources from strategic initiatives. - Resource Constraints: Specialized skills are required to manage and troubleshoot legacy systems, which can be scarce and costly. - Limited Integration and Scalability: These applications often operate in silos, making it difficult to integrate with newer platforms or scale with evolving business needs. - Outdated User Experience: Legacy tools typically offer poor usability, which can impact productivity and user satisfaction.
These challenges collectively hinder agility, innovation, and cost-effectiveness, making a strong case for transitioning to a modern, AI-enabled platform like ServiceNow.

How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The challenges posed by legacy applications, the ideal solution involves a comprehensive onboarding to the ServiceNow platform, leveraging its modern, cloud-native, AI-powered capabilities.

ServiceNow Platform

  • becomes the central hub for all operational workflows, replacing fragmented legacy systems.
  • Enables cross-functional collaboration and data consistency across departments.

Process Automation with Flow Designer

  • Use Flow Designer to automate repetitive tasks and workflows without writing code.
  • Reduces manual effort, improves accuracy, and accelerates service delivery.

Predictive Intelligence

  • Utilize Predictive Intelligence to automate ticket categorization, routing, and resolution.
  • Improves response times and reduces workload on support teams.

Self-Service Portals and Virtual Agents 

  • Deploy Service Portal and Virtual Agent to empower users with self-service capabilities.
  • Enhances user experience and reduces dependency on support staff.

Performance Analytics & Reporting

  • Implement Performance Analytics to monitor KPIs, identify bottlenecks, and drive continuous improvement.
  • Enables data-driven decision-making and strategic planning.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Understanding the full potential of ServiceNow and leveraging the max capability is something that needs to taken care. 

To fully address the challenges of legacy systems, the ideal solution involves a strategic and well-supported transition to the ServiceNow platform, ensuring both technological and organizational readiness.

Challenges could be

  • Change Resistance 
  • Skill Gaps & Training Needs
  • Data Migration Complexity
  •  Customization vs. OOB Usage
